Author: GreenBeanWoof
Text: I'm going to let you know now you pretty much never become happy you just set another lower one because you see no change and it's an endless cycle... Not to be tooooo depressing just coming from someone with... 5 years experience with this (damn 5 years what am I doing with my life) and then usually (at least for me) at some point your latest goal weight is just straight unsustainable or deadly and you end up gaining and you feel like you look even worse than you did when you first were at that weight. Rinse and repeat

Author: molotov-cocktail
Text: hard same. i'm 2 pounds away from my ugw and i still think i look completely normal even tho im allegedly underweight. i think i must have genuine bird bones to weigh what i do whilst continuing to look like i do.   &#x200B;
